website_summaries.verdict: This device may produce a variety of exciting results if you stick with a regular regimen as part of your daily skincare routine.
pros: Combines LED and infrared light for multiple skin benefits, including the improvement of tone and texture and a decrease in the appearance of lines and wrinkles
cons: Not all users experienced noticeable results, and it may take a few months of regular use to see skin improvements

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was supposed to "reduce fine lines and wrinkles" according to the reviews. I have used it for almost 2 months now and have seen NO reduction in the above. I use it 15 minutes a day on each side of my lower face and about the same on my throat. My skin FEELs significantly smoother but the lines and wrinkles are still there. I gave it 2 stars based on the feel of my skin but I wouldn't give it any stars of doing what it was advertised that it would do.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Bray

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother buying.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. I’ve been using this light every day for 3 weeks and I see no difference in my wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Turn three

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using for a month straight. I see no difference at all. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Fayette Morse

customer_reviews.title: I love this. I can have a photo facial everyday
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I can have a photo facial everyday! I am noticing tightening and firming. Also, hyperpigmentation (brown spots) are fading away....I also use Vitamin C Serum 40% and Hyluronic Acid Serum (alternate with Peptides and Hyluronic). Recommend...just be diligent and patient to see results.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a month and have seen a different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not working properly - and I have used it very little
customer_reviews.text: I need to return this - it does not work - please help!
customer_reviews.author: Francis Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Love this light!
customer_reviews.text: Love this light! Have already noticed a huge difference after using for a few weeks. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rudy D Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ladies this works perfectly! I saw results within 4 days!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hill

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I don't care for it at all and would like to return it. I am getting NO results and the unit seems very lightweight and flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking gadget but made no difference what so ever
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking gadget but made no difference what so ever. I used it for two month and saw no difference at all. I kept on hoping and waiting to see a difference and didn't realize they had a return deadline. How convenient for them to have a return deadline set right before consumers realize this gadget is useless. Shame on them for deceiving consumers.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Results after 7 days.
customer_reviews.text: I saw subtle results after using for 7 days and after 30 days have seen significant reduction in fine lines and even smoothed out scarring from an accident. Routine = results.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They hide the most important imformation: the wavelenght and the output in mW or watts.!
customer_reviews.author: Perseo

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhh....
customer_reviews.text: I did love this machine up until a split second ago where I am actively using the LED Lights for pain and the fan inside just began to run intermittently. I hope this is not a prelude to a failed device. The fan sounds like it is struggling to work. If the fan is a complete failure I am not sure if the deivce will work properly. I guess we will have to see.
customer_reviews.author: G-Unit

customer_reviews.title: I bought it from their FB website not from here ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it from their FB website not from here, it does work but you have to continuesly use it. Don’t expect to see immediate result. I noticed my 11 lines between the eyebrows gone after 2 weeks of intense usage.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Happy until..
customer_reviews.text: I was happy until i lost The power supply And no one answered my emails asking about How many watts it Needs since i am in another country or What To do To get a new power supply
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken unit
customer_reviews.text: I would love this if it worked. All the lights don't turn on so if it is working it could be giving me uneven results.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy A.Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: solid science
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift. plus the pain version. There is solid science behind it. I am disappointed by the other reviews on Amazon by ignorant people. Sorry, if led light therapy is good enough for NASA and Harvard to get behind then that's good enough for me. Also if one has problem with a product, don't be lazy/ go ahead and contact the maker.
customer_reviews.author: Ariele

product_meta.title: ReVive Light Therapy DPL Clinical - Wrinkle Reduction
feature_bullets: FDA Approved Light Therapy for Wrinkle Reduction: DPL Clinical - Wrinkle Reduction is the only in-home FDA-cleared light therapy panel for wrinkles and anti-aging treatment. It minimizes the appearance of puffy eyes, dark circles under eyes, smile lines, crows feet, brow lines, and much more!

Infrared and Red Light Therapy: Red and IR light work in synergy to deliver optimal skin rejuvenation. Red light reaches deep layers of the skin, where it stimulates cellular repair and increases circulation to promote a more vibrant, youthful complexion. Invisible to the naked eye, IR light penetrates deeper than any other color in the spectrum. IR light fights the signs of aging and accelerates healing of wounds, cuts, and damage.

Only a Few Minutes a Day: This powerful device supports skin healing and recovery activity, as well as minimizing damage caused by sunburn, bruising, cuts, and scrapes, as well as scarring from acne, with only a few minutes per day.
Production of New Collagen and Elastin: Light therapy stimulates the creation of new collagen and elastin, enhancing the skin tone, color, and texture.
Real Results: 97% of users participating in clinical studies experienced a significant reduction of wrinkles and aging effects!

specifications.Manufacturer: The Regatta Group DBA Beauty Depot
